trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_000<tab>Lost, are you? If you want to know something, go ahead and ask.
TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_010<tab>Serve and protect, of course! The Brass Blades of the Rose keep the peace here in Horizon.
TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_011<tab>We ensure that merchants can conduct their affairs in safety. They compensate us well for our swords.
TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_012<tab>We get coin, the merchants get kept out of harm's way. Everybody profits.

TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_020<tab>It's busy as hells, that's what it is! Horizon's a waypoint for all traffic between Ul'dah and Vesper Bay. Everything loaded and unloaded at the docks passes through here.

TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_021<tab>The constant stream of goods is why the merchants had that contraption installed in the Sunset Gate. Hauling cargo up and down that ramp is backbreaking work.

TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_022<tab>Aye, thanks to all this trade, Horizon's grown quite prosperous over the years. A lot of folk have gathered here as a result, not all of whom have good intentions.
TEXT_REGWILHORIZON_00057_GISELBERDUS_023<tab>Which is why <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> are here, adventurer. Without us, this settlement would've been sacked long ago.
